metadata.name: The Steel Demon
metadata.description:
HE WAS DEVELOPED BY A ROBOTICS ENGINEER WHO WAS ASSASINATED FOR HIS RESEARCH BECAUSE HE REFUSED TO USE HIS TECHNOLOGY FOR BIO TECHNOLOGICAL WARFARE. HOWEVER, HE 
UPLOADED HIS CONCIENCE INTO THE BIO TECH WEAPONIZED  
MECCA DRONE HE DESIGNED: THE ONLY KNOWN PROTOTYPE THAT EXISTED AT THE TIME.  NOW HE IS BACK TO TAKE DOWN THE Corporation as THE Steel Demon.
